short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An advanced auto-click bot extension with customizable settings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An advanced auto-click bot extension designed to automate tasks in Canva. This extension offers customizable settings, allowing users to adjust parameters such as the number of loops and delay time in seconds for efficient automation. Perfect for repetitive tasks like removing backgrounds from PNG files, Mixzer Canva Auto enhances workflow and saves time.
